website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive 3-piece set of bamboo steamer baskets  works well for steaming dumplings, fish, and other foods.
pros: Made completely from 100% natural bamboo, which is eco-friendly and won't leach toxins into food during cooking
Comes with 2 reusable cotton liners for cooking
cons: Some users found that the flavor of the bamboo leached into the food
The bamboo may begin to splinter after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Disgusted
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's because these aren't actually made of bamboo, but after ONE USE the material immediately began to soften as if rotting. Additionally there was a very strong chemical smell. When I went to use them a second time I pulled them out of the cabinet and immediately saw that they were covered in hairy mold. I dried them thoroughly before putting them away but clearly they were soaked and rotted through. What a horrible waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Well made. Does the job. Make sure you use parchment paper on the bottom if you're making wontons or dumplings.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Trovato

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: WASTE OF MONEY ! DO NOT BUY!! I finally used it to make Bao buns tonight with dinner. I washed it before using it cause it smelled strong like chemicals. I allowed it to dry out completely before using it and it was SOFT, so soft that it was bendable. NOT SURE if it’s even real Bamboo. I also lost half of my batch of buns to the insides of the steamers as they were all stuck and wouldn’t come off, I soaked them in water for less than 5 mins and they still won’t come off I’m sure if I let it sit any longer they will fall apart. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Celentano

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Quality made. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Now this is what real flavor of Adian dish comes from! Since I got this I've used it with almost anything. Sorry though I didn't take a photo of my siopao and siomai fast enough! We didn't think of taking pics at all soon as they were cooked. 😊
customer_reviews.author: MK N.

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I love that I can steam a few things or add trays to stem a lot. Love that I can start veggies in one tray & add fish to another & rice to another (with the mat insert) & have an entire meal-ready to go! Way more healthy way of cooking & doesn't take up a ton of storage space. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shonna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the bamboo steamer- easy to use, super quick steaming and thank you for bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Olga G

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty low quality product. I don't mind the stray strands of bamboo, as that seems inevitable, but the slats are really roughly cut. Mine had a slightly broken section where the support thread was exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck considering the cost of other 10" ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for buck considering the cost of other 10" steamers out there. Especially considering the inclusion of the fabric liners, this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my pressure cooker. I even got dough stuck to the sides the first time I used them. I put them in the dishwasher and they came out clean. These are the good quality ones that you can find at Asian​ markets and much better quality than the ones you find in department stores. I'm very happy with this purchase and I would recommend this brand if you are looking for a steamer that is going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Eogeaux

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Works great it's perfect for steaming veggies while cooking rice.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Pitera-Torpey

customer_reviews.title: We really like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product a lot. Great for steaming buns, dumplings, and vegetables for one or two people. Haven't tried it with straight meats yet.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGummyBear

customer_reviews.title: does not last!
customer_reviews.text: Loved my steamer for 3 months then the wood on one of the baskets started falling apart. For $23.00 it sure did not last very long. I can't figure out who to talk to about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Kitterman

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. You can steem your vegetables or anything you want it comes with two conteiners
customer_reviews.author: Nafy

customer_reviews.title: Well made but smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The steamer just came today. I haven't used it yet but I am pleased with how it is made. What I don't like is that I thought it was a 10 inch steamer and it is barely 7.5 inch wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 3rd use. Overall quality is ok, not the greatest but it serves it’s purpose. I just didn’t expect that it can break so soon. I hope the customer service can contact me for replacements.
customer_reviews.author: E.E.

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked for there to be some type of instructions
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo steamer worked well and I really appreciated the cotton liners. I would have liked for there to be some type of instructions; cleaning and caring for this as there were none included in mine. There was a bit of smell that I noticed hopefully not treated but I've realized anything that says 100% natural usually does not mean 100% safe.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Careful of mold
customer_reviews.text: I used this product maybe 3-4 times and it worked great after the next use I took it out of the box again and saw that it had molded horribly- threw it away and will never buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Y. Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and arrived promptly
customer_reviews.text: Came within the two day shipping window as paid for, and was exactly as described. Works perfectly. Great quality of bamboo and isn’t flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Leviaturtle

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.text: This product I is easy to use and easy to clean. The price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Steams vegetables in minutes to perfect taste and without mess!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for quickly steaming vegetables in my microwave. I also ordered the wax paper prtoectors for the bottom of the steammer sections and so clean-up is a breeze. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: one lonely person, less lonely with book

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making meat and veggies dumplings at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: You could find better product
customer_reviews.text: For some odd reasons, this product makes water yellow. Often times it leaves burned deposit on bottom of the pan. One inner liner bamboo piece separated and fell off. Not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: not recommended this way too small
customer_reviews.text: i thought it was big enough but when i got it it was way too small
customer_reviews.author: Vaniza

customer_reviews.title: he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift to a friend, he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Terga

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just as it is described and shown. Used it for a photo shoot ...very authentic! Will use it for cooking, too!
customer_reviews.author: Love2ShopAmazon

customer_reviews.title: when you can find a good pot to stand it on
customer_reviews.text: some wood pieces broke down after 10 times of usage. when you can find a good pot to stand it on, it is nice product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Won An

customer_reviews.title: A good quality steamer at a good price
customer_reviews.text: A good quality steamer at a good price. It's a perfect container for the dim sum set I crocheted for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Fu

customer_reviews.title: Xceptional
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer. The douple tray is nice when you have something that has to come off sooner. Vegetable taste better steamed in it as opposed to a metal steamer. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Henry

customer_reviews.title: Came out great.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for the first time today. Chicken and steamed veggies. Came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Steamed veggies 5 times and the bamboo started falling apart, causing dangerous splinters. I chose to purchase this because of the high reviews but honestly, this is the junkiest, POOREST quality of bamboo steamer I have ever experienced. Please avoid purchasing this!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Han

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised works great. We steamed spinach tamales with it. yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the steamer and especially the reusable liners, they are great, wish it came with more of them, has all the usual issues with any wood product, you must steam the tannins out of it before it stops leaking them, as to be expected. I would recommend a steamer ring to go between the pot and baskets, every steamer basket works best that way.
customer_reviews.author: Skunk Ape

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product was used only for making dimsum so far! Quality: This is a sturdy and well made steamer set! Its very authentic. I personally don't like the cotton steamer sheets provided but that's just my personal preference. Size: This size is big! We can cook enough for four easily! There are two layers and its the size of a standard plate. Ease of use: this is where I docked one star but its honestly not a major issue. the top seems to fit the tiniest bit tighter than the bottom. But it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a non-metal, non-silicone steamer for my veggies and this works great. Both metal and silicone have the potential to leach toxins at high temps -- bamboo on the other hand, does not. Veggies come out perfect every time. I don't use liners and the bamboo is always very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rice

customer_reviews.title: A little stinky....
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit bigger than most standard pots and the smell of bamboo or whatever preservatives they use on the product leaches onto the food. So my food has a bit of an unpleasant taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wallet Belongs to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective- I used this with a Dutch oven.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bamboo steamer for making soup dumplings. It did the trick, and I appreciated it’s reusable cloth liners.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Steamer Basket. Would prefer it if it were slightly deeper to cook larger items..
customer_reviews.text: A very nice steamer basket and while the double basked is a nice idea, the overall height of the baskets limits the type of items you can cook easily. I would have expected more space overall and it has been difficult to fit many items into the space between the two baskets. This is not the case with the steamers you generally see at Dim Sum restaurants. It has held up very well so far and appears to be a well-made and durable product. I am pleased with the purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bamboo steamer. I used it right away on dumplings. They came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: A nice product for learning
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to clean...other than that it does the job it claims to do. It's a cheap product (both in price and quality) so I don't feel it'll hold up consistent usage but for an occassional steam of veggies or dumplings it's fine. I'd call it a good introductory product but nothing to plan on having forever.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought this as a replacement for my old one. This one is much better quality. I expect to get 10+ years of use out of it. I would recommend this to everyone. Getting the two cotton pads was a very nice bonus! Don't waite buy it today!
customer_reviews.author: Merrell Long

customer_reviews.title: No liners
customer_reviews.text: I received the basket, which is nice, but did not receive the liners that were supposed to come with it and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Brearley

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my instant pot and its prefect ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my instant pot and its prefect!!! Been making pot stickers and I can steam them all at once.
customer_reviews.author: tamoroso19

customer_reviews.title: bigger than you think.
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than my old steamer and looks sturdier. Since mats for dumplings were included now I have to try dumplings!
customer_reviews.author: thoughtful grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great tasty and healthy food.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Fast delivery. Well packed. As advertised. Great tasty and healthy food.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS! I USED IT FOR FISH YESTERDAY ON A DISHWASHER SAFE DISH. BEST WAY TO COOK IT! THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Squarepeg27

customer_reviews.title: and good quality, only different is brand
customer_reviews.text: Not much I can say, most these steamer basket product fits satisfaction, and good quality, only different is brand, which seems all made from same factory.
customer_reviews.author: Nehc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, use it at least twice a week or more
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Toptine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Arrived in perfect condition and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I should've ordered the larger 12" size. However, product is exactly as described and arrived early!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mills

customer_reviews.title: It is bamboo, it steams, it works.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bamboo steamer. Well made. Good diameter for my woks. Great replacement for my burned one.
customer_reviews.author: DarkSceptor

customer_reviews.title: like glue, or some sort of wood treatment
customer_reviews.text: It smells very chemical, like glue, or some sort of wood treatment. I returned this product because I don't feel like it would be safe to cook food in. It also did not come with the liners it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: J Martin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work best on bow-type dumplings
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with a couple packages of perforated Joyce Chen steaming paper, and this made steaming frozen dim sum much easier (I had previously been using a metal vegetable steamer). Seems to work best on bow-type dumplings; not so well on greasy dumplings, such as some shumai. The problem there is that the oil escapes from the dumpling, passes through the perforated paper, and soaks into the bamboo basket. Makes cleaning difficult. Now looking for some metal baskets to avoid that problem!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Fine

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After using this for just the 2nd time, the bamboo ring that goes around one of the steamers CRACKED / snapped and the other ring will pretty much crack/snap anytime now...
customer_reviews.author: Cody’s Charm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time.....Should have bought the 10' version.....
customer_reviews.author: Geebee

product_meta.title: Zoie + Chloe 100% Natural Bamboo Steamer Basket - with Bonus Reusable Cotton Liners
feature_bullets: Includes 2 pieces of reusable, size-fitting cotton liners. Eco-friendly alternative to paper liners.
Great for Dim Sum, Dumpling, Veggies and More! Healthy cooking a great variety of foods: vegetables, meats and fish. Cuts down fats and grease.
Doomed lid traps steam for quick cooking while sealing in food's moisture and nutrients. Easy to use over a sauce pan, stockpot or inside a wok.
2 stackable baskets made of 100% natural bamboo; contains no metal, wires or plastic.
High quality eco-friendly and sustainable bamboo ensures great durability.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
